description: Custom attributes that customize ECDb's ECSchema to database mapping.

properties.description: Defines how the ECClass is mapped to table(s). Values: OwnTable (default), TablePerHierarchy, ExistingTable, NotMapped
properties.name: MapStrategy

properties.description: If MapStrategy is 'ExistingTable' provide the table name here. Must not be set in all other cases.
properties.name: TableName

properties.description: Optionally specify the name of custom 'primary key' column which must be of type Int64.
properties.name: ECInstanceIdColumn

DbIndex.description: Specify a database index for an ECClass.

properties.description: Name of the index. Must follow EC identifier rules. It needs to be globally unique in the database.
properties.name: Name

properties.description: Default: false. If true, all values in the indexed properties must be unique.
properties.name: IsUnique

properties.description: List of properties that make up the index. Only properties of primitive type are supported.
properties.name: Properties

properties.description: Where constraint for index
properties.name: Where

properties.description: List of indexes on properties of this class. It can be use to improve query performance or to add unique constraint.
properties.name: Indexes

ForeignKeyConstraint.description: Creates a foreign key for this navigation property.

properties.description: Possible values: NoAction (default), Cascade (which deletes child rows when parent row is deleted), SetNull(foreign key property in child is set to NULL), Restrict (cannot delete parent if it still has children).
properties.name: OnDeleteAction

properties.description: Possible values: NoAction (default), Cascade (which updates child foreign key when parent primary key is updated).
properties.name: OnUpdateAction

JoinedTablePerDirectSubclass.description: Maps subclasses and their children to a joined table. Can only be applied to classes in a hierarchy using MapStrategy TablePerHierarchy.

properties.description: Optional. If not set, a default column name will be used
properties.name: SourceECInstanceIdColumn

properties.description: Optional. If not set, a default column name will be used
properties.name: TargetECInstanceIdColumn

properties.description: Default: true. If set to false, no foreign key constraints are created on the link table. In that case, deleting instance does not delete its relationships in the link table.
properties.name: CreateForeignKeyConstraints

properties.description: Default: false. If set to true duplicate relationships are allowed.
properties.name: AllowDuplicateRelationships

properties.description: If not specified, the ECProperty name is used. It must follow EC Identifier specification.
properties.name: ColumnName

properties.description: If false, values must not be unset for this property.
properties.name: IsNullable

properties.description: Only allow unique values for this property.
properties.name: IsUnique

properties.description: Specifies how string comparisons should work for this property. Possible values: Binary (default): bit to bit matching. NoCase: The same as binary, except that the 26 upper case characters of ASCII are folded to their lower case equivalents before comparing. Note that it only folds ASCII characters. RTrim: The same as binary, except that trailing space characters are ignored.
properties.name: Collation

properties.description: Specifies a prefix for generated tables. If not specified, the alias of the ECSchema is used
properties.name: TablePrefix

ShareColumns.description: Allows to share columns amongst ECProperties. Can only be applied to MapStrategy TablePerHierarchy

properties.description: False (Default):Columns are shared for the properties of the ECClass to which this CA is applied and all its subclasses. True: Columns are not shared for this ECClass but for all of its subclasses.
properties.name: ApplyToSubclassesOnly

properties.description: Maximum number of shared columns to use before using an overflow table (optional). If not specified, ECDb will create as many shared columns until the table has 63 columns.
properties.name: MaxSharedColumnsBeforeOverflow

label: ECDb DB Mapping
name: ECDbMap
